originalText.text: Tim has been my trusted hairstylist for over a decade. His meticulous attention to detail ensures I never leave unsatisfied, especially with my unruly hair. Beyond his exceptional skills, he's a genuinely wonderful person. Our chats about food, restaurants, and travel are the cherry on top. Always a pleasure to get a cut from Tim.

originalText.text: Tim is the absolute best - especially with curly hair which is so hard to find!!

originalText.text: Always a pleasure spending my hair afternoons with Tim. He is a true professional, always does a great job and so nice to deal with.

originalText.text:
He's absolutely the best, Professional is the best word to describe his work. The way he looks on every detail is unique.
The only thing you have to do is sit and trust on his knowledge.
